description: Returns metadata associated with creating a copy of a resource.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID that owns the copy job.

nested_items.name: CopyJobId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a copy job.

nested_items.name: SourceBackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a source copy vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: SourceRecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a source recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: DestinationBackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a destination copy vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: DestinationRecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a destination recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services resource to be copied; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a copy job is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a copy job is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of a copy job.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message explaining the status of the job to copy a resource.

nested_items.name: BackupSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of a copy job.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the IAM role ARN used to copy the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Contains information about the backup plan and rule that Backup used to initiate the recovery point backup.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a backup plan.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup plan; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:plan:8F81F553-3A74-4A3F-B93D-B3360DC80C50.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanVersion
nested_items.description: Version IDs are unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded strings that are at most 1,024 bytes long. They cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: BackupRuleId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a rule used to schedule the backup of a selection of resources.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource to be copied; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database.

nested_items.name: ParentJobId
nested_items.description: This uniquely identifies a request to Backup to copy a resource. The return will be the parent (composite) job ID.

nested_items.name: IsParent
nested_items.description: This is a boolean value indicating this is a parent (composite) copy job.

nested_items.name: CompositeMemberIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of a resource within a composite group, such as nested (child) recovery point belonging to a composite (parent) stack. The ID is transferred from the logical ID within a stack.

nested_items.name: NumberOfChildJobs
nested_items.description: The number of child (nested) copy jobs.

nested_items.name: ChildJobsInState
nested_items.description: This returns the statistics of the included child (nested) copy jobs.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The non-unique name of the resource that belongs to the specified backup.

nested_items.name: MessageCategory
nested_items.description: This parameter is the job count for the specified message category.
